## errorFromStripe() function

Converts an error coming from Stripe into an object with a consistent shape.

**Signature:**

```typescript
errorFromStripe: (err: Stripe.errors.StripeError) => {
    code: string | undefined;
    message: string;
    param: string | undefined;
    status_code: number;
}
```
